thread.title: Atlanta I-85 bridge collapse: How it affects traffic
thread.title_full: Atlanta I-85 bridge collapse: How it affects traffic

author: TheNewsTrend Staff
title: Atlanta I-85 bridge collapse: How it affects traffic
text: 0 SHARE When the bridge over I-85 near Ga. 400 collapsed, one of the first reactions of Atlantans was horror what this means for the city’s traffic. That part of I-85 is close to downtown and provides a major thoroughfare for hundreds of thousands of people. How bad will this be for commuters? The answer, to no one’s surprise, is that it will be terrible. Georgia Department of Transportation data for a spot on I-85 slightly south of the collapse showed 243,000 vehicles traveled there daily. A 2012 estimate said the bridge itself carried approximately 199,160 vehicles a day in both directions.   the full article here. TAGS
